items.sentence: I know that Tom isn't able to do that anymore.
I know that Tom is too young to be doing that.
I know that Tom is the one who should do that.
I know that Tom is still reluctant to do that.
I know that Tom is still motivated to do that.
I know that Tom is still desperate to do that.
I know that Tom is likely to do that tomorrow.
I know that Tom is going to help Mary do that.
I know that Tom is flexible enough to do that.
I know that Tom hardly ever does that anymore.
